column3: str
Welcome to Sinus Ardorum's cosmic fortune counter! Feeling lucky with your lunar credits?
Welcome to Glassblowers' Beacon's cosmic fortune counter! Feeling lucky with your Phaenna credits?
Wait... That signature sparkle! Could it be? <gasp> A Big Bang ticket!?
You should thank your lucky stars, my friend, for that elusive ticket entitles you to a Big Bang fortune─the chance of a lifetime!
Draw a Big Bang fortune.
Draw a cosmic fortune. (<Clickable(<SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(2),2,1)/>)/> required: <Format(IntegerParameter(1),FF022C)/>)
Learn more.
Nothing.
How can I help you?
Here at the Moongate Hub, our member rewards program takes the form of a roulette game. Just spin the wheel and wish on a star for a fabulous prize!
What better way to spend your hard-earned <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(2),2,1)/>? At <Format(IntegerParameter(1),FF022C)/> per ticket, we're practically giving them away!
Upon payment, you'll choose between two roulette wheels. Set your sights on the more tantalizing prize selection, then give it a whirl!
You can find all the details on your exotablet, if you're so inclined.
Wait a moment─you haven't collected your prize from your last fortune! Let's fix that...
On second thought, I can't fit any prizes into a full pack. Come back after you've lightened your load.
Oh dear, I'm afraid you don't have enough <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/>. Come back and see me once you've earned a few more.
On second thought, I won't be able to fit any prizes into a full pack. Come back after you've lightened your load.
Remember: fortune is always a few credits away!
Oh dear, it looks like your bags are full. No need to rush sorting your things, though─I'll be ready and waiting when you're done!
My, what an explosive outcome! If you ever have more shiny tickets burning a black hole in your pocket, come and see me for another Big Bang!
Oh dear, it looks like your bags are full. I'm sure you're eager to try your luck with a Big Bang, but no need to rush. Sort through your things, and I'll be ready and waiting when you're done.
Welcome to the cosmic fortune counter! I hate to tell you this, but our lottery system is under maintenance at the moment. I hope you'll check back later!
